item.title: iTunesRemote
item.description: Control iTunes on your PC using this Instinct app and a download for your PC. Instructions: Part 1 Download iTunesRemote Server (Windows iTunes 8.0 | Windows iTunes 7.4 | Mac) to your PC with iTunes (server app by Tim Desjardins) Extract the .zip to your program files Open port 4444 on your pcâ€™s firewall Open port 4444 on your router Run the server .exe Part 2 Get iTunesRemote instinct app here Launch iTunesRemote instinct app Hit edit button and enter server address (example: http://28.
